description:
Our good friends from Global Grapes have organized an Auntsfield Estate wine tasting, where the winery’s Sales and Business Manager, Lorna Evans, will present their wines.
Participation is limited to 30 people and you MUST register in advance to get confirmation. Please note this event is not organized by me or this Meetup group, therefore I cannot guarantee your spot at it. To register visit this link: http://www.globalgrapes.be/index.php/joint-Auntsfield-wine-tasting  and the guys from GG will send you a confirmation email if places are still available.

See you there!
Cheers!

More info:
AUNTSFIELD ESTATE WINES
Global Grapes have had the pleasure to offer Auntsfield Estate wines in three years, and already at year one, their wines were amongst our most-enjoyed and best-selling wines. The recent vintages have shown even more promising notes, which have been widely recognised by wine experts world-wide. For example, Parker has given the 2010 Auntsfield Estate Pinot Noir 91 points, where the 2009 had “just” 90 points.

Just FYI
There is a second event taking place on 24th April: Winemaker’s dinner at resto Eat East (Price: €59. Limited to 30 participants) for which you can also register at the link provided.

venue.name: New Zealand's Embassy
venue.address_1: Address will be provided after signing up

name: Kiwi wines tasting

description:
Etiquette has the largest selection of wine by the glass in Belgium so it sounds like the perfect place to hold our first Wine Tastings Brussels event :) 

Their traditional "end-of-the-month" free tasting will take place on Saturday 26th April. Let's meet there to enjoy some wines and meet-up for the first time.  The theme for the evening is Portuguese wines and there will be some winemakers on site explaining their wines.


Cheers!

Please note: although the event is free of charge, each guest has to pay for their own consumptions, if any.
name: Wine tasting at Etiquette

description:
Oeno TK offers a great wine list with options from France, Italy and Spain. They also have charcuteries and cheeses to pair with them so I says it sounds like a great plan for a Thursday night in Brussels.


See you there? 


Cheers!

Please note: each guest pays for their own consumptions.
name: Let's wine in Châtelain!

description:
13° is Brussels' newest wine bar in the heart of the European Quartier. Let's get together for a little mid-week break, share a few glasses and meet new people.


Cheers! 


Please note: this is a cash only bar, so bring some with you! ;)
name: Drinks @ Bar à vins 13°

description:
Have you always dreamed about visiting the land of Messi, the Pope, the Queen of the Netherlands, tango and dulce de leche? Well, here's your chance of flying to Argentina for the night!


Cheers Tastings' popular Argentinian Night Tasting is back! We will share a mouth-watering traditional picada (a must every Sunday back home) while we taste (and learn about) Argentinian wine (including our flagship grape, Malbec). Join me for a fun, relaxed, typical Argentinian get together with lots of food, wonderful wine, plenty of laughs and great company.

Limited spots left. Be in quick to book! Cheers! www.cheerstastings.com


Please note: to ensure attendance and calculate drinks/food, you will have to pay before RSVP (via Paypal). Please see our refund policy below. Thanks!

venue.name: Ixelles
venue.address_1: Address will be sent to guests after signing up

name: Argentinian Wine Tasting + Traditional Picada!

description:
This lovely wine bar in Saint Gilles specializes in a single French region: Languedoc-Rousillon, which has 2,800 km2 of vines and is the single BIGGEST wine-producing region in the world, being responsible for more than a third of France's total wine production. 

Did you know that in 2001 Languedoc-Rousillon produced more wine than the entire United States?

If you'd like to try out some of their wines and share some laughs with tasters like you, join us after work!

Cheers!
www.facebook.com/cheerstastings


Please note: although the event is free of charge, each guest has to pay for their own consumptions, if any.
name: Cheers at La Trinquette!

description:
Want to enjoy bubbles, wines, snacks and chocolate with other ladies while getting a make-over and make-up tips from a professional? Then come join us! 

We will gather at a private residence for an afternoon of pampering, drinking and networking co-hosted by a professional sommelier (me!) and a professional make-up artist, Aura.

This first Meetup will cover "Every day make-up tips" so come prepared: apply make-up as you usually do and bring your own so Aura can give you a quick make-over and tips to look your best on a daily basis.

On the drinks' side of things we will go for a fancy summer approach: "bubbles, white & rose wine" paired with delicious snacks and chocolates (and explanations from me) ;)

Have a relaxing and girlie Sunday afternoon recharge to finish up your weekend in the best possible way ;)
Cheers!
Barbara and Aura
<a>www.facebook.com/cheerstastings­</a> 

IMPORTANT:
The event will ONLY take place if a minimum of 8 participants is guaranteed by Friday 5th September.

Since this is a paying event, please check our Refunds Policy: http://www.meetup.com/Wine-Tastings-Brussels/pages/Refunds/ and our revised No-Shows and RSVP Rules before you RSVP and pay: http://www.meetup.com/Wine-Tastings-Brussels/messages/boards/thread/45240022
name: Girls only wine tasting & make-up afternoon!

description:
Join us at this Cheers Tastings’ event for an evening of bubbles, snacks and chocolate while you get “vamped up” for a night out by a make-up professional!

We will gather at a private residence for an evening of pampering, drinking and networking co-hosted by a professional sommelier (me!) and a professional make-up artist, Aura. 

This ladies-only Meetup is the second of our series of “Make-up & Wine” events and it will cover "Night out make-up tips" so come prepared: apply make-up as you usually do and bring your own so Aura can give you a quick make-over to get you ready for a night out in town and share cool tips with you to make the most out of the make-up you already own. 

On the drinks' side of things we will go for a fancy Saturday night approach: bubbles, bubbles & more bubbles! paired with delicious snacks and chocolates (and explanations from me) ;)

A fun, chic and girlie get-together to get you ready for a night out in town in style ;) 

Cheers! 
Barbara and Aura 
http://www.facebook.com/cheerstastings  

IMPORTANT: 
The event will ONLY take place if a minimum of 8 participants has RSVP and paid by Thursday 2nd October. 

Since this is a paying event, please check our Refunds Policy: http://www.meetup.com/Wine-Tastings-Brussels/pages/Refunds/ and our revised No-Shows and RSVP Rules before you RSVP and pay: http://www.meetup.com/Wine-Tastings-Brussels/messages/boards/thread/45240022
name: Ladies-only Wine & Make-up Evening!
